name: Kane
description: I’d describe myself a man with a kind heart, loving, caring and affectionate of course, good listener who likes to take in the opinion of others and see what benefit i can derive from it..Sense of humor is one huge attributes of me lol..A God fearing man who likes to act according to his will and not an advocate of cheating in marriage or serious relationship..So dedicated with my job,but still wouldn’t let that take away my concentration and giving enough good time to spend with my partner if ever lucky enough to find one.. I hope i honestly could come across her on here..
